arts.ttl: Henriksen slams referee after Mainz lose to Heidenheim
arts.sum: Mainz coach Bo Henriksen was unimpressed with referee Florian Exner after his side's defeat to Heidenheim.

arts.ttl: Mainz vs Heidenheim preview: Die Nullf√ºnfer to get form rolling
arts.sum: Meeting for just the third time in the Bundesliga, Mainz and Heidenheim prepare for this weekend's clash at Mewa Arena with the hosts looking to build on last weekend's first win of the campaign.

arts.ttl: Preview: Mainz 05 vs. Heidenheim - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Mainz 05 and Heidenheim, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
